title: Collaborative Argumentation-Based Science Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Online learning environment for R&D department employees. Requires structured task design to facilitate learner interaction

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 80% or higher participation rate in collaborative argumentation with peers on scientific issues.
Learners utilize two or more question types (open-ended/convergent) during three or more argumentation activities.
Learners validate scientific conclusions derived from collaborative argumentation through three or more peer reviews.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
